t: Redeem an Amazon Gift Card - Amazon Customer Service
s: When you redeem an Amazon.com Gift Card to your account, the funds are stored in Your Account and will automatically apply to your next eligible order.

t: Amazon.com: Amazon Gift Card Balance FAQ: Gift Cards
s: You can use your balance toward eligible items on Amazon.com, including physical products, digital content, and offers from third-party merchants. You can also use your gift card balance for certain subscription services, such as Prime. Eligible goods and services are subject to change at our ...

t: Amazon.com: Amazon.com Gift Card Balance Reload : Gift Cards
s: You can set up Auto-Reload to schedule automated fund transfers to your balance--either when your funds drop below a certain amount or on a regularly scheduled daily, weekly, or monthly basis. Each reload transaction adds an Amazon Gift Card to your Amazon Gift Card balance.

t: Amazon Gift Card Balance Check, Buy Online, Redeem Code
s: An Amazon Gift Card is like digital money you can use to buy things on Amazon. You can give it to someone as a gift or use it yourself. These gift cards are easy to use and help you shop without needing a credit card.
